overview: The operetta after the honeymoon is the final installment of the series of maiden and honeymoon caresses. In this part there was a great development in the story as it was presented 12 years after the second part in the year 1989. In addition to the duo, the hero of this operetta from the beginning, Abd al-Hussein Abd al-Ridha and Suad Abdullah, artist Intisar al-Sharrah participated.
title: After the Honey
